subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Rangers Coach John Tortorella will be back behind the bench for Game 7, but Blair Betts will not. He was injured after a blind-side hit by Washington's Donald Brashear.
snippet: Rangers Coach John Tortorella will be back behind the bench for Game 7, but Blair Betts will not. He was injured after a blind-side hit by Washington's Donald Brashear.
